titles.title: Ukraine War Risk Insurance Act
Ukraine War Risk Insurance Act
To provide temporary war risk insurance for certain commercial vessels operating importing goods to, or exporting goods from, Ukraine.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
